item.title: Stop Asking Me To ‘Unify’ With The Violent Left
item.description: There can be no unity between good and evil. Somebody has to win this thing.

item.title: ABC News’ Matt Gutman Fabricates Quote To Make Alleged Kirk Assassin Look More ‘Touching,’ ‘Human’
